data.speaker: User
data.message: PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1 PERSON_LASTNAME_3 : PERSON_FIRSTNAME_3 sir/madam, I would like to check regarding citation, what reference format do I use if the source I want to cite was once a print newspaper but decided to go fully digital (and cease print edition)? Thank you very much!

data.speaker: User
data.message: PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1 PERSON_LASTNAME_3 : No, I found the source online. Just that previously this website (Today.com) has print edition but it has gone fully digital now, so I am not very sure if i should cite it as a newspaper article or as a webpage from a news website.

data.speaker: User
data.message: PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1 PERSON_LASTNAME_3 : I see, thank you very much! Have a nice day :)

data.speaker: User
data.message: PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1 PERSON_LASTNAME_3 : Nope, I will consult again if I face any problem. Thank you!

data.speaker: Help Desk
data.message: PERSON_FIRSTNAME_2 PERSON_LASTNAME_1 : PERSON_FIRSTNAME_3 PERSON_LASTNAME_3, this is PERSON_FIRSTNAME_2 PERSON_LASTNAME_2 from Library. How may I help you?

data.speaker: Help Desk
data.message: PERSON_FIRSTNAME_2 PERSON_LASTNAME_1 : The content that you are citing, was it only available in the print newspaper? If so, you can cite it as a newspaper article

data.speaker: Help Desk
data.message: PERSON_FIRSTNAME_2 PERSON_LASTNAME_1 : since it is from Today online, you can just cite it as content from a news website

data.speaker: Help Desk
data.message:
ebpage on a news website(Section 10.16)

Format: Author, A. A. (YYYY, Month dd).Title. Site name. URL

Dowd, V.(2020, June 1).How Europe's art world is welcoming back visitors.BBC News.https://www.bbc.com/news/entertainment-arts-52881862

In-text: (Dowd, 2020).

data.speaker: Help Desk
data.message: PERSON_FIRSTNAME_2 PERSON_LASTNAME_1 : Is there anything else I can help you with?

data.speaker: Help Desk
data.message: PERSON_FIRSTNAME_2 PERSON_LASTNAME_1 : Ok. Do feel free to contact us again through this chat or email us at library@smu.edu.sg for any other assistance. Have a nice day!
